contextual_notes: User's satisfaction initially increased as they received relevant information.
Satisfaction decreased as the user repeatedly expressed readiness to proceed independently.
general_insights: Provide concise and relevant information to meet user needs effectively.
Recognize when users are ready to act independently and adjust the level of assistance accordingly.
Avoid overwhelming users with repeated offers of help when they indicate they are ready to proceed.
